chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: In today's video, we will understand about float and clear.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Since the Flexbox has been launched,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: these properties have been used very less.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But if a client shows you a website

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: which has float and clear,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then your understanding should be such

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: that you can understand what float and clear is.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: In this video, we are going to see this.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Like with high energy

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: and write Sigma batch OP in the comment section below.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Guys, I have come inside the computer screen.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But in this video, I will say something

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: that you will also say that what did you say?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But before that, I want to explain to you

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: how float and clear works.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So here you see, I am going to make a folder

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: under the name of video number 34.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So I made a folder under the name of video 34

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: and I opened it in VS Code.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And what I am going to do here

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: is that I will show you here

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: that exactly on which HTML

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: we will understand the concept of float and clear.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And what I am going to tell you about CSS float and clear

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: is that you will say that what did you say?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So let's do one thing.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: We will make a div under the name of .cards

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: and I will do .card multiply by 3 in it.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So there is a card, there are three more cards in it.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And I will make card 1, card 2, card 3 like this.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Here I will make card 2 and then card 3.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I have written a very simple HTML here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I will open it in the browser.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: It looks something like this.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, great, very good, very beautiful.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Now tell me what float and clear is.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So let me tell you.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So what will happen is that I put an img here with the letter.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And I take an image here with the letter.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Open image in new tab.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I take another image which has a straight URL.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Let's use this image.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: That's it.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Let's use this image.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And now you see here

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I will use this image.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: This image has come here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I will give a width in it.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I will give width is equal to in it.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So I will say width is equal to 23 pixels.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And let's see this small image has come here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: In fact, let's do 230.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Let's see the image.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So this is our image.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And below is card 1, card 2, card 3.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I know you said that it looks very good here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Tell me further.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So the scene is this.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Let's say I put a paragraph below it in card 1.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So in the div of card 1, I put a paragraph in it.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: In this I write lorem 34.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So if I write lorem 34 in this,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then it will come down here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But what will happen if I say this image

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: that I want to float my image in this.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Left.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I want to say float left.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So it will float to the left

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: and allow content on its right side.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Before it was not allowing.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But now it will allow content on its right side.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So this is our float.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Now I want to show you some things here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: First of all, I will put a style in dot cards here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Which will be border 2 pixels solid black.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And with that, I put this.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So see this came from black color.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And why did I put this border?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: You will also find out.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And I am going to put border 2 pixels solid red in dot card.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Why did I put this?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: You will find out.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So I put this in the cards.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So there is a red border in every card.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And there is a black border in the container.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Now you have seen one thing.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Whenever we use float property,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then if the image is overflowing from the container,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then it overflows.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: It does not accommodate in its container.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So we can use this property.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So in our parent container,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: we can put display.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And we can put a flow route in the display.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And as soon as we write display flow route here,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: you will see that this issue will be solved here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Now it will not overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So this is one way by putting display flow route,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: we can fit the elements within the container.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: What would have happened if I had made it float right?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Nothing, it would have floated to the right and content would have come to the left.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So you can see here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And it came to the right and the content is floating here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: If I had written something big in it,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: like if I had written lorem 333,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: lorem 333,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: and lorem 333 is a good amount of text.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Then you will see that the text will not be cut.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: The image will float here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And this will come like this.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So this was used a lot earlier

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: when we used to make newspaper type content.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: In most of the blogs,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: there was a need that the image will be on one side,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: content will be on one side.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And the image is floating sometimes on the left,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: sometimes on the right.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And the article is being written.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But the modern layouts are not designed like this at all.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Now you see here,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I will tell you what is clear and when to use it.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So what did we do here?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: We said that the image will flow on the right side.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: We said that these are cards,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: we put borders on the cards and saw which element

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: is taking exactly where and how much space.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: We also saw this.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Now if I want,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: this specific div,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: which has more text,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I want it not to allow

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: any element to flow on the right side.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Listen to me carefully, I am repeating.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: It should not allow any element to float on the right side.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So it will say that

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: no element should float on my right side.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And for that we use the clear property.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So we will write here,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: clear,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I will put another class in this,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: but what I will do here,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I will say dot card and

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: we will use nth child and write 2.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: If the second one is here,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then acquire the background color of it

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: and clear it right.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So this means that I don't want any element on my right.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: This is what clear right means.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So what is this div saying?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I don't want any element on my right.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Please remove any element

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: that is floating on my right and give me my place.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So here you see,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: as soon as I did clear right here,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then this div,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: this div is ours,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I have made nth child 2.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And let's see which child it has taken.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So I should have made nth child 3.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Because this is the first child of the image,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: this is the second child of the cards.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And this is the third child.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So I should have made nth child 3.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So see what it said,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I don't want any element floating on my right.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: It said clear right.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So it was given its place below.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So it was given its place.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But this one will float on its right side.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: So whenever you want your element to fall below,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then you can clear,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: you can clear right,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: you can clear left,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: you can clear both.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I don't want any element on both sides.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: If you don't want any element on the left and right of this div,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then you can say clear both.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Neither will it come on the left nor on the right.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Now if I float it from the left to the right,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then you see what will happen.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: I make it left.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: If I float it to the left,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then it will float to the left.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But now this div will allow,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: because it was saying that

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: don't allow an element on my right side.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: What was on this div?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Clear right was there.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: And what does clear right mean?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: No element is allowed on my right side to float.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But it is allowed on the left.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: See, it is allowed on the left.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: But if I clear both in this,

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: then it means that

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: neither can I see here nor here.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: This is what the element is saying.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: What is it saying?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Everyone write to me in the comment section below

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: that what is this div saying?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: This div is saying don't go to see.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Did you understand?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Neither can you see on the left nor on the right.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Everyone write this in the comment.

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, so what is this div saying?

chunks.title: CSS Float & Clear  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #34.mp4
chunks.text: This div is saying
